column1: Master of Science in Food Safety Regulation
column5: Promote Access to Safe, Healthy FoodBecome qualified to promote safety at every level of the food supply chain with the online Master of Science in Food Safety Regulation program from the Johns Hopkins University Advanced Academic Programs division. Through this online degree program, you will examine the roles of food production and harvesting, pest control, storage and transport, food processing, production, advertising, and handling. By pursuing this career-focused degree, you can:
